channel.title: Blue Shift Hi Def Pack
channel.description: Just wondering something: anyone else have access to the "upgrade" but prefer the original more? I admit I know little about firearms, but I definitely preferred the MP5 skin to the new one (MP4 I think it was?). I also preferred the original shotgun, though apparently the HiDef one is more accurate in terms of looks.

item.title: Blue Shift Hi Def Pack
item.dc:creator: JeffMOD
item.description:
HumanParadoxx:

where can I find the Hi Def pack for Half-Life?
SOMEONE PLX TELL ME!!!

Screw Gearboxes HD pack, just download your picks.
Mine:
Everything from this page except grunts
Hgrunts, Assasins, HEV and Osprey from here
And somewhere in the svencoop area of FPSBannana there is a pack of HD weapons from the Gearbox HD pack, just add some of your favourite HD-armed models from the web to the list from there.
I like Red Slug’s Glock and RPG, myself. I think my Mp5 is his, too.

Read full topic

TBH, to be completely satisfied, I would have to combine original, Hi-def pack and diamond pack models together.

item.title: Blue Shift Hi Def Pack
item.dc:creator: Ballsopt
item.description:
I really liked the zombies in the HD pack. Their mutation was much more apparent. And the updated weapons seemed appropriate as well.

I dunno tho, the old chuck jones-style character models had a certain charm to them.

Read full topic

item.title: Blue Shift Hi Def Pack
item.dc:creator: Mr_Someguy
item.description:
The only thing I didn’t like about it was that the M4A1 is 5.56mm, not 9mm as is portrayed in the HD pack. Also, the M4 clipped into the ground on the ‘dead grunt’ model.

Read full topic

item.title: Blue Shift Hi Def Pack
item.dc:creator: baconeggs
item.description:
I really liked the M4, but was always annoyed that it was a mere skin for the MP5. The two weapons are just too different, it’s like reskinning the RPG with an M79.

Read full topic

item.title: Blue Shift Hi Def Pack
item.dc:creator: jimbob60s
item.description:
i liked a lot of the upgrades, particularly the shotgun. Just couldnt get why they replaced the mp5sd5 with a M4 and didnt upgrade its firepower (makes a lot of noise but is pretty impotent. Understandably this would change the whole game, but to me they could have just recreated a better mp5.
Also, agree the grunts look better, but they’re helmets dont deflect bullets anymore, plus they’re heads are larger and more vulnerable… meaning when fighting alien slaves, they die easier (also cant head shot on an alien slave), i found this altered the outcome of a lot of the fights.

Read full topic

item.title: Blue Shift Hi Def Pack

item.description:
Played several times with and without it. These days, its the only way to go until black mesa is released

item.title: Blue Shift Hi Def Pack
item.dc:creator: Ramirezoid
item.description:
It may have made more sense to have the Military using Beretta, and you started out with a Glock. Then you would just collect ammunition until you had to lose the Glock, then you’d either pick up another one, or a Beretta.

But that would just be ridiculous.
